hairdresser.translation[0].definitions[0: a person who cuts, washes, and arranges people’s hair in particular styles
hairdresser.translation[0].note_box[0].s: a person who cuts, washes, and arranges people’s hair in particular styles
I have a hairdresser’s appointment this afternoon.
a man whose job is to cut men’s hair and sometimes to shave them
How often do you go the barber’s?
someone who cuts or arranges people’s hair as their job
Renee was the top stylist at the salon.
someone whose job is to give beauty treatments to your skin, hair etc
Her beautician told her she had problem skin.
